name: Green Red Blue
description:
GREEN RED BLUEDescription

Green Red Blue is a game for Windows where you are a robot being overrun by blobs and robots in a science lab. Get as many points as you can by matching the color of the laser with the enemy to hurt them, just don't let them hit you. This game was made in less than a week for the One Button Jam, and like most of my games, is free to play.

How to Play

Space. That's it. Match the color of your laser with the color of your opponents. Don't die.
